mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food_record (record_time, user_id, food_id, food_weight, calories, fat, protein, carbohydrates, sodium, potassium, dietary_fiber) VALUES (#{recordTime}, #{userId}, #{foodId}, #{foodWeight}, #{calories}, #{fat}, #{protein}, #{carbohydrates}, #{sodium}, #{potassium}, #{dietaryFiber})
mapper.update: UPDATE food_record SET record_time = #{recordTime}, user_id = #{userId}, food_id = #{foodId}, food_weight = #{foodWeight}, calories = #{calories}, fat = #{fat}, protein = #{protein}, carbohydrates = #{carbohydrates}, sodium = #{sodium}, potassium = #{potassium}, dietary_fiber = #{dietaryFiber} WHERE food_record_id = #{foodRecordId}
